CustomField.formula:
CASE( Contact.language__c , "de", "www.trustedshops.de", "en", "www.trustedshops.co.uk", "fr", "www.trustedshops.fr", "nl", "www.trustedshops.nl", "it", "www.trustedshops.it", "pl", "www.trustedshops.pl", "es", "www.trustedshops.es", "pt", "www.trustedshops.pt", "", IF( OR($UserRole.Name = "CX Manager Market 1", AND(CONTAINS($UserRole.Name, "Touch"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,"Market 1"))),
"www.trustedshops.de",
"www.trustedshops.com"),
"www.trustedshops.com")
CustomField.label: zz Signature URL
